cab.content: THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENTINQUIRY INTO THE USE OF MAN-POWER BY THEROYAL AIR FORCE.Note by the Prime Minister.FOLLOWING the discussions on man-power in the War Cabinet, I havedecided to set up a Cabinet Committee comprising The Deputy Prime Minister (in the Chair);The Minister of Production; and h The Paymaster-general to enquire into the establishments of the ground personnel of the RoyalAir Force and the proportion which they bear to (a) First-line strength; and(b) Sorties against the enemy.As regards (a) the Committee should take the number of first-line aircraft on the 12th July, 1943; and, as regards sorties against the enemy,the second quarter of 1943.The Secretaries of the Committee will be Mr. Clement Jones andMr. A. Mackay.w. s. c.10 Downing Street, S.W. 1,. 31st July, 1943.Printed for the War Cabinet. July 1943. . - - -SECEET. Copy No. 33W.P. (43) 352.31si July, 1943.WAR CABINET.
